items.sentence: I learned the hard way that crime doesn\'t pay.
You should boil this water before you drink it.
You can take a shower in the upstairs bathroom.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t likely to be arrested.
Tom didn\'t drink the juice that Mary gave him.
Tom didn\'t even thank Mary for cooking dinner.
Why do you think smoking is a disgusting habit?
Was your junior high school far from your home?
Tom turned right and Mary headed the other way.
Tom goes for a walk every morning with his dog.
